entry.title: Wednesday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early this evening. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light overnight. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 6:49 PM CDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of light snow. High zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of light snow in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h late in the afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 6:49 PM CDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 17. POP 30%
